name: Minecraft Bedrock Editor Project
summary: An MCPROJECT file is a project file created by Minecraft Bedrock Editor, an in-engine world editor for Minecraft Bedrock Edition. It contains a Minecraft Bedrock Edition world and settings associated with that world. In Bedrock Editor, users can export the world an MCPROJECT file contains as an .MCWORLD file.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
